descriptions:
['DescriptionLa Rosa by Dubai Holdings is a plush residential project located at Villanova in Dubai. Dubai Holdings is a
reputed realty company in Dubai. These exceptionally beautiful villas are located in a serene area which is
close to the city and it is just the mirror image of the beautiful Mediterranean lifestyle. It is just like a small
town within a city. A lovely place to be at.
What are the key Details of the project?
You can opt for either 3 bedroom or 4 bedroom villas as a wide variety is available to choose from. The villas
are well-equipped with world-class modern specifications to make you fall head over heels in love with these
alluring houses.
What are the amenities available here?
The range of amenities will surprise you as you will get almost everything modern and chic. The gated
community provides security always. Lovely parks with perfect jogging tracks. A shopping centre to suffice
your daily household needs. A huge play area for children, help them grow better, let them play. A community
swimming pool where you can enjoy your leisure time. Well-equipped gymnasium to keep you in great shape.
Beautifully landscaped gardens with paved compounds and car parking areas.
Advantage of the location
Location wise this place earns an extra brownie point because it is strategically located in near the junction of
Emirates Road and Al Ain road. It takes 7 minutes to reach the Global village from this place. Within 15
minutes you will reach Dubai airport, just 18 minutes to Business Bay. It takes just 15 minutes to Down Town
Dubai. This place is also close to well-known schools, colleges, hospitals, recreational areas, etc.
USPs of the project:
Community swimming pool
Gymnasium
Parks landscaped gardens and paved compounds
Car parking areas
Play area for children
Townhouse Size – 1947.
Townhouse Price – 1277900.
For more details, feel free to call us the earliest.']
